item.title: Help adding skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @Nyghtmares Nyghtmares
item.description:
@Nyghtmares wrote:

right i got these codes of this page i added them to client.java and it gave me 100 errors these are the codes public String skillBar = “@gre@[—SkillCapeBar–]@gre@”;
public int skill = 19;
public int skillTimer = 0;

public void SmithingSkillCape(){
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6569) {
if (playerLevel[13] >= 99)
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (skill >= 9) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(445, absX, absY, 100);
staticAnimation(524, absX, absY, 100);
staticAnimation(479, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(2836);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
skill -= 9;
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Wearing The Smithing Skill Cape”);
}
}
